xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 20 June 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has quit 08:17 <mcupak> has quit 11:01 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 13:46 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 13:46 <kushalkhandelwal> How are you ? 13:49 <sdumitriu1> Hold on, talking with bvancea 13:54 <kushalkhandelwal> OK :) 14:08 <sdumitriu1> Hey kushalkhandelwal 14:08 <kushalkhandelwal> Hello 14:09 <sdumitriu1> So, what are you working on? 14:10 <kushalkhandelwal> Digit Recognition 14:10 <kushalkhandelwal> and some big data analysis 14:10 <kushalkhandelwal> in python django 14:10 <kushalkhandelwal> learning mongodb for that 14:10 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1, I have to start with my project for phenotips 14:11 <kushalkhandelwal> From where should I start 14:11 <kushalkhandelwal> Lets discuss about it when you get free so that I start working 14:11 <sdumitriu1> Sure 14:13 <kushalkhandelwal> So when will you be free ? 14:13 <sdumitriu1> In a few minutes, finishing up with Bogdan 14:14 <kushalkhandelwal> Ok 14:14 <kushalkhandelwal> Will wait till then 14:28 <sdumitriu1> OK 14:29 <sdumitriu1> Let's see 14:31 <sdumitriu1> I know 14:31 <sdumitriu1> You can start by marking phenotype mapping files with an object 14:31 <sdumitriu1> So, create a PhenoTips.PhenotypeMappingClass class 14:32 <sdumitriu1> Add fields to it: name (String), description (Textarea) 14:36 <sdumitriu1> Then add objects of this class to the existing mappings 14:36 <sdumitriu1> And change the two inputs where the mapping is chosen to list only existing mappings 14:37 <sdumitriu1> - on the administration page, where the global mapping is chosen 14:37 <sdumitriu1> - in the user profile, where a custom mapping for a user is chosen 14:39 <kushalkhandelwal> Hmm ok 14:39 <kushalkhandelwal> so first thing would be mapping 14:42 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1, 14:43 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:44 <kushalkhandelwal> Would start working on it :) 14:46 <kushalkhandelwal> Starting phenotips after a long time :) 14:46 <sdumitriu1> Do you still remember how to set the full skin, which shows the edit->class menu? 14:47 <kushalkhandelwal> full skin ? 14:47 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:48 <kushalkhandelwal> Tell me 14:48 <kushalkhandelwal> it was ctrl+g 14:48 <kushalkhandelwal> for opening a file ? 14:49 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:49 <kushalkhandelwal> Its not working :( 14:49 <kushalkhandelwal> in firefox also 14:49 <sdumitriu1> Hm... 14:49 <sdumitriu1> Make sure the page has focus 14:49 <sdumitriu1> Click on the page 14:50 <kushalkhandelwal> It has 14:50 <kushalkhandelwal> I get the search bar 14:50 <sdumitriu1> Any JS errors? 14:50 <kushalkhandelwal> Oops 14:50 <kushalkhandelwal> I figured it 14:50 <kushalkhandelwal> I had disabled js in ff 14:51 <kushalkhandelwal> from webdev toolbar 14:52 <kushalkhandelwal> and for editing object it was something like 14:52 <kushalkhandelwal> http://localhost:8081/bin/edit/PhenoTips/PatientSheetCode?editor=object 14:52 <sdumitriu1> Yes 14:52 <kushalkhandelwal> Is this full skin ? 14:53 <kushalkhandelwal> Sorry , long time I might ask stupid questions 14:53 <kushalkhandelwal> Give me 1-2 days and I would be back on track 14:54 <kushalkhandelwal> So i need to add new objects in this page ? 14:55 <sdumitriu1> No 14:56 <sdumitriu1> The full skin was to go to the administration, wiki administration, Look & Feel -> Presentation, and set "colibri" as the skin 14:56 <sdumitriu1> You must add a new class 14:57 <sdumitriu1> http://localhost:8081/bin/edit/PhenoTips/PhenotypeMappingClass?editor=class 14:57 <kushalkhandelwal> Oh 14:57 <kushalkhandelwal> In never did that before 14:57 <kushalkhandelwal> full skin thing 14:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Didn't knew abt it 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> So I have created the objects 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Rest tmrw 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> From now would be regular on IRC 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> and work :) 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Sleep time 15:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Good Night :) Meet you tomorrow 15:06 <sdumitriu1> Good night 15:09 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 17:00 <sdumitriu1> has quit 17:30 <bvancea> has quit
